text: Ferreri may refer to: ==People== * Jean-Marc Ferreri (born 1962), French footballer of Italian origin * Juan Ferreri (born 1970), Uruguayan footballer * Giusy Ferreri (born 1979), Italian singer-songwriter * Marco Ferreri (1928–1997), Italian film director, screenwriter and actor * Walter Ferreri, Italian astronomer ==Other== * 3308 Ferreri, main-belt asteroid
title: Ferreri
